title: 145 followers Problems #2
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the minimum value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"({ a }^{ 3 }{ c }^{ 2 }+{ a }^{ 2 }{ b }^{ 3 }+{ b }^{ 2 }{ c }^{ 3 })({ b }^{ 3 }c+a{ c }^{ 3 }+{ a }^{ 3 }b)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" if the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ a }^{ 3 }{ b }^{ 3 }{ c }^{ 3 }=27"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and given that they all are positive real numbers."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can find a similar question or rather a prequel to this problem "},{"type":"text","text":"145 followers problem #1","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If you want to help me and others in other questions which are from NMTC final level, you may want to look "},{"type":"text","text":"here","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" too."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Cheers!"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^3b^3c^3=27"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":","},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b^3c+ac^3+a^3b=\dfrac{b^3a^3c^3}{a^3c^2}+\dfrac{b^3a^3c^3}{a^2b^3}+\dfrac{b^3a^3c^3}{b^2c^3}=\dfrac{27}{a^3c^2}+\dfrac{27}{a^2b^3}+\dfrac{27}{b^2c^3}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
by cauchy sarwaz:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"({ a }^{ 3 }{ c }^{ 2 }+{ a }^{ 2 }{ b }^{ 3 }+{ b }^{ 2 }{ c }^{ 3 })({ b }^{ 3 }c+a{ c }^{ 3 }+{ a }^{ 3 }b)=({ a }^{ 3 }{ c }^{ 2 }+{ a }^{ 2 }{ b }^{ 3 }+{ b }^{ 2 }{ c }^{ 3 })(\dfrac{27}{a^3c^2}+\dfrac{27}{a^2b^3}+\dfrac{27}{b^2c^3})\geq (\sqrt{27}+\sqrt{27}+\sqrt{27})^2=\boxed{243}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 147 Follower Problem
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\large a\\cdot b\\cdot c = 147\\ \\ \\ \\ \\ a < b < c"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"\nHow many triples of integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(a,b,c)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfy this equation?"}]}]}
